name: Team Profile Generator

image.alt: output of the team profile generator project

description: This program asks a serious of questions about a manager and their engineers/interns and builds an HTML page with all the team members details.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather forecast app that gives the current weather and a five day look ahead as provided by openweathermap.org APIs for a users search. It also saves the past 5 locations that the user has searched for in localstorage.

name: Moviepedia
description: A group project that built a front-end web service to allow users to search up information about a film including key actors. This app will run in the browser, and will feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by JavaScript code.

name: Quiz
description: A multiple choice quiz that has a high score leaderboard that saves between visits to the website.

name: Planner App

image.alt: planner app with 1pm highlighted in red as current time

description: A planner app which allows you to enter your appointments/meetings for the current day and saves to local storage so your schedule is available next time you load the page.

name: Console Finance App
description: This is a javascript console app to calculate various items from an array of financial data.
